      Gets the coordinates of the cell.
      Methods in com.absynth.battleship.data with parameters of type Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Cell BattleshipBoard.getCell(Coord c)
      Method to retrieve a cell based on a given Coord.
      static boolean Coord.isValidCoord(Coord c)
      Convenience method which determines if the coordinate is valid or not, meaning whether the row or the column is INVALID_ROW or INVALID_COL respectively.
      private boolean BattleshipBoard.setGrenade(Coord c, Player p)
      Method which sets the content of the given coordinate to Content.GRENADE which is owned by the given player.
      private boolean BattleshipBoard.setShip(Coord c, Player p)
      Method which sets the content of the given coordinate to Content.SHIP which is owned by the given player.
      private void BattleshipBoard.unhideCell(Coord c)
      Provides a way to unhide a specific cell.
      Constructors in com.absynth.battleship.data with parameters of type Coord 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(Coord coords)
      Default constructor, which takes only the absolute necessary information, the coordinates of the cell.
      Cell(Coord coords, Cell.Content content, java.lang.String owner)
      Constructor which initializes all the fields by calling the default constructor with the given coordinates, but also modifies the other fields based on what the user has entered in the parameters.

      protected Coord User.getCoord() 
      protected abstract Coord PlayerAdapter.getCoord()
      Should provide a convenient way of getting a valid coordinate for the game board.
      protected Coord Computer.getCoord()
      Generates an implicitly valid coordinate (there is no validation check)
      private Coord User.getCoord(java.lang.String query)
      Convenient method that lumps together the querying and response checking of the query until the user enters a valid Coord based on User.responseValidation(String).
      Coord User.placeGrenade() 
      abstract Coord PlayerAdapter.placeGrenade() 
      Coord Player.placeGrenade()
      Method which is used to ask the player to return a coordinate which the board will use as to place a grenade.

      Coord User.placeShip()

      Coord Player.placeShip()
      Method which is used to ask the player to return a coordinate which the board will se to place a ship.
      Coord Computer.placeShip() 
      private Coord User.responseValidation(java.lang.String response)
      Method used to confirm that the user response to a coordinate query is valid by checking: the length of the response (response.length == 2 ) Checks if the coordinate created by the 2 character coordinate is valid
